reputationMenu.seeHowYouEarned:
**Functional Purpose**: Link to view all reputation tokens
**UI Location**: Reputation dropdown menu (bottom link)
**When Users See This**: When the reputation dropdown menu is open
**Technical Context**: Standard text. No special formatting.
**Current English**: "See how you earned all your reputation"
reputationIcon.reputationAriaLabel:
**Functional Purpose**: ARIA label for the reputation icon button
**UI Location**: Global navigation header (reputation icon)
**When Users See This**: When the reputation icon button is present in the header
**Technical Context**: The variable `%{reputation}` must remain unchanged. This label is for accessibility.
**Current English**: "%{reputation} reputation"
